overview: When chain gang prisoners attack their guards, some of the hardened criminals escape Brazil's infamous Anchieta Prison amidst all the pick-ax carnage. The government dispatches a machine-gun squad to round up the fugitives, who have fled by foot and boat and now have begun to turn on each other.
tagline: Run convict. Run from the sun.  ... the cry is escape now or die!
title: The Violent and the Damned
